attributes.description: General ECCS logs index pattern for real-time log ingestion via TCP/Beats.
attributes.name: eccs-logs-*
attributes.title: eccs-logs-*

attributes.description: Index pattern for email processing logs from MongoDB. Contains fields for error tracking, latency metrics, and retry analysis.
attributes.name: eccs-email-logs-*
attributes.title: eccs-email-logs-*

attributes.description: Index pattern for application logs from MongoDB. Contains service events, errors, and trace information.
attributes.name: eccs-app-logs-*
attributes.title: eccs-app-logs-*

attributes.description: Index pattern for saved locations with geo_point coordinates. Used for Kibana Maps visualization of user locations.
attributes.name: eccs-locations
attributes.title: eccs-locations
